attributes.action: put diplomatic pressure on the EU and the Bulgarian Government to stop the neglect in Mogilino social care home for children and others like it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After seeing this shocking insight into the terrible condition of care for such vunerable children, we as an EU country have a duty to respond by putting pressure on the Bulgarian authorities to ensure this abuse is stopped!More then 1000 people have already voiced their concern on BBC points of view, but this has now closed. Please support me to ensure we do not let this become yesterdays news. These children are suffering daily.
